title: Chestnut and caramelised banana cakes
ingredients: ['Muffins', '120g caster sugar', '145g chestnut flour', '2 teaspoons of vanilla sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3 eggs', '140g melted butter', 'Icing', '125g of cream cheese', '40g soft butter', '80g icing sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Decoration', '2 bananas, peeled and thickly sliced', '2 tablespoons sugar']
